data.text: @whithersoeva @KevinBardosh @VCHhealthcare @UBC No one shouldn't be surprised by any of this. Big Pharma not only donates millions to university science programs but is one of the top sponsors for many school internship programs. And some universities are also state funded. None of this is about science, but the mighty $

@KevinBardosh @alexdefig @rachelgurarie @sdbaral @ID_ethics @JEGanthro @s_keshavjee @StraightStats @TrudoLemmens Globe and Mail now too. @ID_ethics @sdbaral

@KevinBardosh @VCHhealthcare @UBC Has UBC revoked the mandate since? BC is one of the harshest jurisdictions now globally. One of the most fanatical.

@KevinBardosh @VCHhealthcare @UBC I firmly believe this has nothing to do with Science or Health, and everything to do with political control by outside forces. When nothing makes sense, look elsewhere.  #WEF

@KevinBardosh @VCHhealthcare @UBC @VPrasadMDMPH I'm puzzled by "Vaccine effectiveness however, after a booster dose, has been shown to be 60% effective at preventing transmission of Omicron." How long? Don't boosters wane after a few months? I thought Omicron variants so transmissible, vaccination didn't matter.

@KevinBardosh @alexdefig @rachelgurarie @sdbaral @ID_ethics @JEGanthro @s_keshavjee @StraightStats @TrudoLemmens ( BTW...I have had interaction with Dr. Mark L. from VCH - I trust him too. I cant say the same for BC PH in general sadly)
